title: Sidecar Lingo
directions: Fill a lowball glass with ice; add cognac, cherry liqueur, orange-flavored liqueur, and lemon juice. Stir and add vanilla bitters and aromatic bitters.
ingredients: 1/2 cup crushed ice, or as desired
2 fluid ounces cherry liqueur (such as Heering)
1 fluid ounce orange-flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau)
1 fluid ounce freshly squeezed lemon juice
5 drops vanilla bitters (such as Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters), or more to taste
